law.history: Repealed 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 40, effective March 30, 1992. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 214, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1986; and ch. 296, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 6.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Appointment of additional employees -- Payment of salaries.
